DOC.detailed_description: We plan conduct retrospective cohort study assemble research database patient shoulder pain 1/1/02-12/31/06 presenting Hershey Medical Center . Data extraction include medical record number , demographic data ( age , race/ethnicity , sex , insurance type ) , pre-fracture functional status , pre-admission residence , medical co-morbidities , prior hospitalization within 30 day , abnormal clinical finding admission , shoulder score , pain score , range motion score , type diagnosis ( partial tear , full thickness tear , tendonitis , shoulder pain ) , occupation , past medical history , physical therapy duration physical therapy , cigarette/cigar use , drug use , alcohol use , treatment protocol ( anti-inflammatory medication , injection , etc . ) , complaint patient pain status .
